name: Tapping Sea Bubble
description:
Relax and sit back while you collect the shells by simply popping the bubbles with your finger in this cool arcade game. Special starfish power-ups will show up if you manage to clear 5-7 shells of the same kind in one go.

FEATURES:

- Bonus Bubble
- Customizable game screen background
- Tap score indicator
- Top 10 high scores list
- Global Leaderboard
